featured.text: “If, in 1900, Paris was consecrated the ‘city of light’, it will become the ‘capital of light’ for the millennium,” Tiberi said.

definition.zh_def: 使神聖化；奉獻給神明或宗教用途。
definition.en_def: To make something sacred or dedicate it formally to a divine purpose.
definition.example: The church was consecrated in a special ceremony.
